marklogic.body:
In reply to someone who said, in essence, "What do you expect, when you wear a hoodie?"...
My mother Always used to buy me hooded sweatshirts because they are practical. Â Any time it rains or the weather turns Colder, you can cover your head. Â I never thought they looked that great, or felt that comfortable, but I had to agree they are practical.
It never occurred to me that you might think me wearing it gave you the right to shoot me. Â That never entered into my considerations before.
